text: fbtghyanhm mllu alrrahat wal'amn wrghd aleysh, wqalu: rabana ajeal qurana mtbaedt; lybed safarina bynha, fala najid quraa eamrt fi tryqna, wazalamuu 'anfusahum bikufrihim fahlknahm, wajaealnahum ebrana wahadyth liman yati bedhm, wfarraqnahm kl tfryq wkhrbt bladhm, 'iina fima hala "bsba" laebrt likuli sbbar ealaa almkarh walshdayd, shakur lnem allah teala
